text: Danny Van Haute (born October 22, 1956) is an American former cyclist. Van Haute qualified for the 1980 U.S. Olympic team but did not compete due to the U.S. Olympic Committee's boycott of the 1980 Summer Olympics in Moscow, Russia. He was one of 461 athletes to receive a Congressional Gold Medal instead. In 1981, Van Haute was one of the original members of the 7-Eleven- Schwinn speed racing team. He did get to compete in the points race event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:American male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of the United States Category:Congressional Gold Medal recipients Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Tillsonburg Category:Sportspeople from Ontario
title: Danny Van Haute
